price: 127. Bazali na ndako ya kimia epai na Nkolo na bango, mpe azali mobateli na bango na maye bazalaki kosala.
arabic: ۞ لَهُمۡ دَارُ ٱلسَّلَٰمِ عِندَ رَبِّهِمۡۖ وَهُوَ وَلِيُّهُم بِمَا كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: lahum dāru al-salāmi ʿinda rabbihim wahuwa waliyyuhum bimā kānū yaʿmalūna
